item.title: Memory from "Cats" - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: A, F-sharp minor, D, C-sharp minor, Bm, E, F#, B, F, Dm, Bb, Am, G, C, Em (Starts in the key of A, ends in the key of C).
Memory from the musical “Cats” by Andrew Lloyd Webber. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. I just added chords to the lyric video created by YouTuber Miyanoe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Anthony Hamilton - Freedom
item.description: From the motion picture Django Unchained Performed by Anthony Hamilton & Elayna Boynton.

item.title: Johnny Cash - Personal Jesus
item.description: Performed by Johnny Cash Written by Martin Gore
